content: * 1 double_crochet in first double_crochet chain 2 1 double_crochet in 5 double_crochet chain 2 1 double_crochet in chain-5 space from * across the whole row then we crochet the bodice as following 1 row *in first 8 2-chain spaces 2 double_crochet = 16 double_crochet in next 2-chain space chain 3 single_crochet chain 3* from * till * repeat across 2 row * 16 double_crochet across 16 double_crochet chain 3* from * till * repeat across this 2 row we always repeat and we begin with shaping of the bodice with decreasing in the 5 row in every second part of 16 double_crochet double_crochet together the 8 + 9 double_crochet = 15 double_crochet 6 8 row without decreasing in the 9 row in every first part of double_crochet double_crochet together the 8 + 9 double_crochet = 15 double_crochet 10 13 row without decreasing in the 14 row row in every second part of double_crochet double_crochet together the 7 + 8 double_crochet = 14 double_crochet 15 17 row without decreasing in the 18 row in every first part of double_crochet double_crochet together the 7 + 8 double_crochet = 14 double_crochet 19 21 row without decreasing in the 22 row in every second part of double_crochet double_crochet together the 6 + 7 double_crochet = 13 double_crochet 23 25 row without decreasing in the 26 row in every first part of double_crochet double_crochet together the 6 + 7 double_crochet = 13 double_crochet 27 28 row without decreasing in the 29 row in every second part of double_crochet double_crochet together the 5 + 6 double_crochet = 12 double_crochet 30 31 row without decreasing in the 32 row in every first part of double_crochet double_crochet together the 5 + 6 double_crochet = 12 double_crochet 33 37 row without decreasing then we begin with increasing in the same way as by decresing t m we make 2 double_crochet in one st of previous row alternately in second and first part of double_crochet 38 row 1 double_crochet increase in the second part of double_crochet 39 41 row without increasing 42 row 1 double_crochet increase in the first part of double_crochet 43 46 řada row without increasing 47 1 double_crochet increase in the second part of double_crochet 48 a 49 row without increasing 50 1 double_crochet increase in the first part of double_crochet then we make the lace part in the same way as at the begining of the bodice after motifs t m we repeat this pattern 1 row chain 3 = * 1 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 double_crochet previous row * from * till * across the whole row 2 row chain 3 6 double_crochet in chain 2 skip next
